name: The Monarchs Erupt
text:
Activate this card only if you have no cards in your Extra Deck and control a Tribute Summoned monster.
①: Negate the effects of all face-up monsters on the field, while those monsters are face-up on the field, except Tribute Summoned monsters'.
②: During your End Phase, if you control no Tribute Summoned monsters, send this card to the Graveyard.
